textContent:
---2 mos---

Happy 2nd monthsary my dearest princess! It's unbelievable how each month just keeps getting better than the last! Sabi nila, the infatuation, the feelings, etc., will settle down daw a few months in, pero tangena nila 4 months na bat lumalala lang lalo HAHAHAHAHA. I'm starting to think na di talaga applicable yung rule na yon saten bby HAHAHA. Kase isipin mo, ngayon pag three days tayong di nagkikita jusko, sadboy nako ugh HUHUHUH. GAGI PANO AKO NIYAN SA SCHED MO THIS CUT OFF. MATE NAKU.

We love each other too much, and by each passing day, we're just finding newer and better ways to express it. With that, I'm much more excited to see what's to come in my future together with you!!! 

---monthly recap---

The past month has been very very eventful bby! Unang una sa lahat. Rawr. Pangalawa. Rawr ulit. BWAHAHSHjdkAHSDJKASH IHH BASTA HUHUHU. Alam ko may dedicated letter na yon sa mga bibigay ko sayo pero kase di parin ako makamove on kahit na three weeks ago na yon HAHAHA. I love you so much bby! I'll never ever break your trust! And I will never ever change! Lagi kang maganda sa paningin ko, lagi kang magiging sexy paningin ko. You will always be my best girl! Kahit na binigay mo na saken first time mo, I promise you, I will never ever change the way I treat you and I will only keep loving you even more!

---monthly recap 2---

I also met your friends for the first time this month! And they were great people! Alam ko na alam mo na I find it difficult to meet new people and that has not changed even a bit. Pero for you, since I love you so very very much, gagawin ko kahit na alam kong mahihirapan ako. And worth it naman kase nga, your friends are funny and nice people and I'm glad you introduced them to me! I also want to thank you bby kase you're always there for me nung kasama naten sila. You always try your best to make me feel included and I love you so much for that! 

Di ko alam kelan kita mapapakilala sa mga kaibigan ko kase unang una sa lahat, konti lang sila talaga HAHAHAH tas yung isa, magiging tatay na kaya busy na talaga BWAHAHAHAHAHA HAY NAQ. Need ko na talaga maghanap new friends HAHAHAHAHA.
title: May 7, 2024
textContentHtml:
---2 mos---


Happy 2nd monthsary my dearest princess! It's unbelievable how each month just keeps getting better than the last! Sabi nila, the infatuation, the feelings, etc., will settle down daw a few months in, pero tangena nila 4 months na bat lumalala lang lalo HAHAHAHAHA. I'm starting to think na di talaga applicable yung rule na yon saten bby HAHAHA. Kase isipin mo, ngayon pag three days tayong di nagkikita jusko, sadboy nako ugh HUHUHUH. GAGI PANO AKO NIYAN SA SCHED MO THIS CUT OFF. MATE NAKU.


We love each other too much, and by each passing day, we're just finding newer and better ways to express it. With that, I'm much more excited to see what's to come in my future together with you!!! 


---monthly recap---


The past month has been very very eventful bby! Unang una sa lahat. Rawr. Pangalawa. Rawr ulit. BWAHAHSHjdkAHSDJKASH IHH BASTA HUHUHU. Alam ko may dedicated letter na yon sa mga bibigay ko sayo pero kase di parin ako makamove on kahit na three weeks ago na yon HAHAHA. I love you so much bby! I'll never ever break your trust! And I will never ever change! Lagi kang maganda sa paningin ko, lagi kang magiging sexy paningin ko. You will always be my best girl! Kahit na binigay mo na saken first time mo, I promise you, I will never ever change the way I treat you and I will only keep loving you even more!


---monthly recap 2---


I also met your friends for the first time this month! And they were great people! Alam ko na alam mo na I find it difficult to meet new people and that has not changed even a bit. Pero for you, since I love you so very very much, gagawin ko kahit na alam kong mahihirapan ako. And worth it naman kase nga, your friends are funny and nice people and I'm glad you introduced them to me! I also want to thank you bby kase you're always there for me nung kasama naten sila. You always try your best to make me feel included and I love you so much for that! 


Di ko alam kelan kita mapapakilala sa mga kaibigan ko kase unang una sa lahat, konti lang sila talaga HAHAHAH tas yung isa, magiging tatay na kaya busy na talaga BWAHAHAHAHAHA HAY NAQ. Need ko na talaga maghanap new friends HAHAHAHAHA.
